qas.question: Where does Oklahoma have a fine Egyptian art collection?

answers.text: Mabee-Gerrer Museum of Art in Shawnee

qas.question: Where is the largest collection of Dale Chinuly's work?
What kind of art did Dale Chinuly make?
Where is the National Cowboy and Western Heritage Museum?
Where is the largest Jewish art collection in the southwest?

answers.text: Sherwin Miller Museum of Jewish Art of Tulsa

context: The Egyptian art collection at the <a0_0>Mabee-Gerrer Museum of Art in Shawnee<a0_0/> is considered to be the finest Egyptian collection between Chicago and Los Angeles. The <a1_0>Oklahoma City Museum of Art<a1_0/> contains the most comprehensive collection of <a2_0>glass sculptures<a2_0/> by artist Dale Chihuly in the world, and <a3_0>Oklahoma City<a3_0/>'s National Cowboy and Western Heritage Museum documents the heritage of the American Western frontier. With remnants of the Holocaust and artifacts relevant to Judaism, the <a4_0>Sherwin Miller Museum of Jewish Art of Tulsa<a4_0/> preserves the largest collection of Jewish art in the Southwest United States.
